name: Fanmade Stranger Things: VR Game
description:
Note: FOR LEGAL REASONS I MUST CLARIFY THAT THIS IS A FAN-MADE PASSION PROJECT AND IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH NETFLIX IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM!!!

Hawkins Laboratory wants to take you on a journey to another world in the name of research! Take part in testing for our simulation of the other side before hopping into the real thing as a trainee here at Hawkins Laboratory!

IF YOU ARE A FAN OF STRANGER THINGS, THIS VR GAME IS FOR YOU!!!

CAT AND MOUSE - 

Always wondered what the Upside Down is like up close and personal? Ever wanted to experience the terror of being hunted by a Demogorgon? Well, now you can see it for yourself! Face the Demogorgon and escape through the gate before it's too late! 

ESCAPE -

Power your escape from the twisted alternate dimension and find the gate to escape the facility!
